title: Please nerf lucian
body: idk who in riot thought giving an adc the ability to double tap AA's was a good idea. how is any other adc supposed to counter being hit 6 times before they can attack twice? to make matters worse he is near impossible to CC now that you guys made/making most CC skill shots and he has a dash that loses cool down every time he uses another ability. im not saying he cant be countered but it is very difficult and almost impossible. i just played a game as supp morg against him and i pretty much had to sacrifice myself each time me and my adc fought him just to make sure we killed him. i mean i dont mind doing that as support, im just saying its a bit unbalanced.

replies.body:
Lets see.. How many other ranged champions have obvious passive or timed effects that buff their AA?
Gnar, Caitlin, Ashe, Vayne.. The list goes on.

The solution is always the same: wait for them to expend it before making obvious, poorly-timed trades over an inferior creep wave.

Yes, i agree they have AA buffs but their buffs are different. those are every number of attacks they get  buffed attacks minus ashe that is her Q. his is a passive that lets him double tap AA when using an ability. even you manage to dodge his auto lock Q or W he can stay on top of you with his E which reduces CD every time he hits you with his passive so you cant out run him if you are someone like ashe or mf. im not saying he is impossible to counter just really hard to.
